Your boss forces you to use Copilot over ChatGPT.

Send your boss this side-by-side comparison:

✦ Quick answer.

ChatGPT is the clear winner.

☑ Longer answer, more detailed.
☑ More sources, with articles' images.
☑ Just as fast, but way more articulated.

✦ Deep answer.

ChatGPT is simply smarter.

☑ It reasons deeper.
☑ It gave me a much better analysis.
☑ It surprised me in its thinking to (actually) help.

✦ Research.

ChatGPT is not just better, but miles ahead.

☑ Much, much longer research.
☑ The depth of the analysis is unmatched.
☑ It feels like both features aren't even the same.

Using Copilot instead of ChatGPT in 2025 is like driving a horse cart on a highway full of cars.

Stay ahead of the AI curve. Go to how-to-ai.guide.
